name: Jonatas de Moraes Junior
title: Senior Fullstack Software Engineer
profile: With about 17 years of experience in IT, I consider myself a very versatile professional capable of performing at every step of the development proccess - from requiremets through development and delivery - always following the precepts of the Agile methodology. My main focus is on product quality, both code and deliverables.

experiences.title: Systems Architect / Tech Lead
experiences.description: Designed and implemented several systems for different customers, involving Web and Mobile applications and Cloud environments. Created CI/CD pipelines for most of them, and automated development environments in oder to speed up onboarding proccesses. Responsible also for recruitment and mentoring of newcomers.
